text:
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR
UNIVERSITY OF ILLINOIS
119 GREGORY HALL
URBANA, ILLINOIS
November 30, 1953
Tos Executive Committee
From: Harry Skornia
Re: NAEB Associate Director
Herewith data on sole candidate, so far, a very
capable lad I didn*t know till he turned out to
be best candidate for Vienna Radio Program Officer*s
job. A very brilliant and unusual person.
Bell of Arizona not interested, Roland E. Fenz
indicated interest, but has not reacted to
invitation, sent three weeks ago, to apply. More
if and as received.
Regards,
HJS :do
